Articles.Content:
here are a few suggestions i feel would improve the game-play for contracts

1. the present contract interface is clunky,this features i think will help improve the contract interface.

a) please add a scroll bar while in launch and assembly phase.its hard to go through the contracts

add a feature like bookmarking or highlighting contracts.we will be customize the open contracts so we can set certain contracts for certain missions.

c) add a feature like an alert that all conditions are met and this items must be activated for contract

d) extra staging feature like certain de couplers or boosters get activated at a predesignated speed or altitude or time or when contract preconditions are met. im not able to test separators both at a time as they keep screwing up the trajectory.

e) ability to select more than one item will in path so as to activate 2-3 items all at the same time.
